content: only *** rounds 59-61 knit all stitches round 62 *k1 k2tog* repeat to end of row knitting fiend and lover of way too many remaining stitches 12 things crafty sarah sagaser lives in ohio with rounds 63-65 knit all stitches her husband and two dogs she has designed a handful of fairly simple but fun designs and round 66 *k2tog* repeat to end of row you can find her on ravelry com as sarahlou or at her blog skeinsandbeans com remaining stitches 6 finishing cut yarn with 8 length remaining thread this onto a tapestry needle and through remaining stitches and then through center of hat to inside pull snugly to close up the remaining stitches and knot then © lizclink weave in all ends © 2007 sarah sagaser original pattern release 8/30/07 revamped 10/18/2011
